hero.title: Reveal the Meaning
hero.description: Discover hidden meanings through AI-powered dream interpretation, personalized horoscopes, and mystical tarot readings.

interactive.title: Choose Your Mystical Path
interactive.meowModeTooltip: Meow mode activates a fluffy fortune-telling cat: it purrs, hisses, and predicts fate with a tailed character.
interactive.atmosphereModeTooltip: Enables mystical background music to create an atmosphere of ancient rituals and magical practices.

dreams.title: Dream Interpretation
dreams.description: Reveal hidden meanings and symbols in your dreams through AI analysis.
dreams.placeholder: Describe your dream in detail... What did you see, feel, or experience?

horoscope.title: Personal Horoscope
horoscope.description: Get personalized astrological insights based on your birth data.
horoscope.placeholder: Provide your birth date, time, location, or any other personal information for a personalized reading...

tarot.title: Tarot Reading
tarot.description: Receive guidance through mystical tarot card interpretations.
tarot.placeholder: Ask a specific question or describe a situation you need advice about...

numerology.title: Numerology
numerology.description: Discover the mysteries of numbers in your life through birth date and name analysis.
numerology.placeholder: Enter your full name and birth date (e.g., John Smith, March 15, 1990)...

oracle.title: Oracle Question
oracle.description: Receive wise answers from an ancient oracle on any life question.
oracle.placeholder: Formulate your question about love, work, future, or any other area of life...

regression.title: Past Life Regression
regression.description: Discover memories from past incarnations and their connection to the present.
regression.placeholder: Describe yourself, your life, interests, or simply write 'show me my past life'...

loadingMessages: Listening to what the Universe whispers...
Cleaning the mirror of the future...
Searching for answer in dusty archives of Fate...

modal.signUpDescription: Create an account to continue chatting with AI
modal.signInDescription: Sign in to your account to continue
modal.switchToSignIn: Already have an account? Sign In
modal.switchToSignUp: Don't have an account? Sign Up
modal.terms: By signing up, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy.
